content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll generate a report summarizing the existing structures and error tips:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Smelting Area at (0,0)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0,0)
- Stone furnace at (2,0) 
- Stone furnace at (4,4)
All furnaces have coal fuel but are currently idle without ingredients

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at (9.5,11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

### Power Generation System at (-7,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Lab Setup at (0.5,28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at (0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Missing
- Cannot research advanced technologies (electric-energy-distribution-2, stack-inserter, advanced-electronics, logistics-3) without first researching their prerequisites
- Research chemical science pack and its prerequisites before attempting advanced power distribution
- Research plastics before attempting advanced electronics
- Research production science pack prerequisites before attempting logistics-3

### Invalid Technology Names
- Technology names "Optics" and "Modules" are invalid - verify correct technology names in the API

### Already Researched Technologies
- Avoid attempting to research already completed technologies (advanced-material-processing, fast-inserter, military, logistics-2)
- Check research status before attempting to start new research

### Resource Management
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into boilers
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in power generation system
